notFound.title: No Result Found
notFound.desc: No results were found matching your search. Please change your search and try again.

city-select.title: Select a city
city-select.description: If you want, you can list the places close to your device location, or you can choose a city and list the places close to that city.

distance.title: Distance
distance.description: Choose how many kilometers/meters away from the city center you want to see.
distance.label: Distance (km)

features.title: Select Feature
features.description: Choose which features you want to see the venues.

time-spent.title: Avg. Elapsed Time
time-spent.description: Determine the average time interval you will spend in venues. The time interval is calculated in minutes.

query.title: Word Search
query.description: Search venue name, description, or tags.
query.label: Word

is-payed.title: Paid Venues
is-payed.description: Choose whether entry to places is paid or free.
is-payed.label: Paying Places

is-free.title: Free Venues
is-free.description: Check this option if you want to see free venues.
is-free.label: Free Places

types.title: Select Type
types.description: Choose which types of venues you want to see.

review.title: Review Score
review.description: Determine the review range of venues.

payed.subtext: You have to pay for this place.

free.subtext: You can visit this place for free.

desc.eating: This is a place where you can eat.
desc.coffee: This is a place where you can drink coffee.
desc.bar: This is a place where you can drink alcohol.
desc.amaze: This is a place where you can have fun.
desc.shopping: This is a place where you can shop.
desc.transport: This is a place where you can use public transport.
desc.culture: This is a place where you can learn something.
desc.nature: This is a place where you can enjoy nature.
desc.health: This is a place where you can get medical help.
desc.sport: This is a place where you can do sports.
desc.nightlife: This is a place where you can have fun at night.
desc.museum: You can learn new things here.
desc.antique: You can see ancient things here.
desc.themePark: You can have a fun time here.
desc.other: This is a place where you can do something else.
